results.content: This course is awesome, not like some wordpress courses in udemy, this course doesn't need a premium theme/plugins, using only free theme/plugins to make a professional e-commerce website, everything just like in free preview video, the instructor is also rich in wordpress development experience, replied my question quickly and properly, if you looking for a wordpress e-commerce class, you can try this.

response.content: Thanks for such a detailed review @LEI NIE
